channel.title: Signlink for a webclient
channel.description:
Ok well when this occurs [code]connection error - retrying in #[/code]
I know its because its an issue getting the cache. Well, EVERYONE here played RS so couldnt I have it connect to the Jagex cache? its usually in the same place but im not sure if it would work or not

item.title: Signlink for a webclient
item.dc:creator: @blackr79 blackr79
item.description:
@blackr79 wrote:

you need to upload a cache up that works

Read full topic
